name: Sins of the Squirrels
description:
Play as a squirrel and fight off the dogs in your local park! Transform between your agile squirrel form and hard-hitting buff form to defend you and a player 2 from being attacked by dogs!!

Roles in the Project:

Avery (Thomas Palmer) (2108735) - Programming

Zack Clarke (2119604) - Programming

Emma Turner (2060800) - Art

Joel Rhind-Tutt (2119737) - Design
